Text:
Classification: Scripted
Genre: Comedy | Drama
Status: New Series
Network: ITV1 ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Fridays at 09:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: January 11, 2013
Episode Order: 6

Great Night Out is a comedy drama series written by Mark Bussell and Justin Sbresni, with additional material by Jonathan Harvey and Steve Turner. The show follows the antics of four thirtysomething men who gather each week for a night out on the tiles in their home town of Stockport.


(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-33846)
